name: job-hunt-backend
description: Job Hunt Management System backend (NestJS + Prisma)

scripts.start: bash -lc 'export NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-production}; if [ -x ../scripts/use-env.sh ]; then ../scripts/use-env.sh node dist/main.js; else node dist/main.js; fi'
scripts.start:dev: bash -lc 'export NODE_ENV=development; if [ -x ../scripts/use-env.sh ]; then ../scripts/use-env.sh npx nest start --watch; else npx nest start --watch; fi'
scripts.start:prod: bash -lc 'export NODE_ENV=production; if [ -x ../scripts/use-env.sh ]; then ../scripts/use-env.sh node dist/main.js; else node dist/main.js; fi'
scripts.test:e2e: bash -lc 'export NODE_ENV=development; if [ -x ../scripts/use-env.sh ]; then ../scripts/use-env.sh jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json; else jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json; fi'
scripts.prisma:migrate: bash -lc 'export NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; if [ -x ../scripts/use-env.sh ]; then ../scripts/use-env.sh npx prisma migrate dev; else npx prisma migrate dev; fi'
scripts.prisma:generate: bash -lc 'export NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; if [ -x ../scripts/use-env.sh ]; then ../scripts/use-env.sh npx prisma generate; else npx prisma generate; fi'
scripts.prisma:seed: bash -lc 'export NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; if [ -x ../scripts/use-env.sh ]; then ../scripts/use-env.sh ts-node --transpile-only src/prisma/seed.ts; else ts-node --transpile-only src/prisma/seed.ts; fi'
scripts.prisma:reset: bash -lc 'export NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; if [ -x ../scripts/use-env.sh ]; then ../scripts/use-env.sh npx prisma migrate reset --force --skip-generate --skip-seed && npm run prisma:seed; else npx prisma migrate reset --force --skip-generate --skip-seed && npm run prisma:seed; fi'
